label: HelpActivity
text: To add a self motivation quotes to favourites list just press bright yellow 'Star' icon next to the self motivation quotes . Press it again to remove it from favorties. How to add self motivation quotes to favourites? In self motivation quotes app you can share your favourite self motivation quotes in Facebook SMS and more. From self motivation quotes page press the share button on top and select Facebook. You will see a login window where you can enter your login credentionals and share the self motivation quotes. How can I share self motivation quotes ? Please make sure that the app is installed on your device's internal memory. If it is on the external storage you need to move it to phone's Settings/Applications/Manage Applications/... and click on 'Move to phone'. I cannot find the self motivation quotes widget
